summary: The federal government manages 29% of the land in the United States. We reviewed the extent to which federal agencies collected data on hardrock mining on federal land, and found that the Bureau of Land Management and Forest Service are the 2 agencies that reported collecting some of this data. title: Hardrock Mining: Availability of Selected Data Related to Mining on Federal Lands
